mapper.select: select i.itemId, i.imgUrl , i.itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPriceGST, i.slab1Discount as slab_1_discount_default, i.slab2Discount as slab_2_discount_default, i.slab3Discount as slab_3_discount_default, i.slab1Start as slab_1_start_default, i.slab2Start as slab_2_start_default, i.slab3Start as slab_3_start_default, i.slab1End as slab_1_end_default, i.slab2End as slab_2_end_default, i.slab3End as slab_3_end_default, i.slab3End as slab_3_end_default, i.brandId, i.categoryId, i.ItemDetails as itemDetails, asi.areaId, asi.slab1Discount as slab_1_discount_area, asi.slab2Discount as slab_2_discount_area, asi.slab3Discount as slab_3_discount_area, asi.slab1Start as slab_1_start_area, asi.slab2Start as slab_2_start_area, asi.slab3Start as slab_3_start_area, asi.slab1End as slab_1_end_area, asi.slab2End as slab_2_end_area, asi.slab3End as slab_3_end_area, a.areaName as areaName from item i left join area_slab_item asi on i.itemId = asi.itemId left join area a on asi.areaId=a.areaId where brandId=#{brandId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( itemId, imgUrl, itemName, itemPrice, itemPriceGST, slab1Discount, slab1Start, slab1End, slab2Discount, slab2Start, slab2End, slab3Discount, slab3Start, slab3End, brandId,categoryId,itemDetails ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{imgUrl}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemPriceGST}, #{slab_1_discount}, #{slab_1_start}, #{slab_1_end}, #{slab_2_discount}, #{slab_2_start}, #{slab_2_end}, #{slab_3_discount}, #{slab_3_start}, #{slab_3_end}, #{brandId},#{categoryId},#{itemDetails} )
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET imgUrl = #{imgUrl}, itemName = #{itemName}, itemPrice = #{itemPrice}, itemPriceGST = #{itemPriceGST}, slab1Discount = #{slab_1_discount}, slab1Start = #{slab_1_start}, slab1End = #{slab_1_end}, slab2Discount = #{slab_2_discount}, slab2Start = #{slab_2_start}, slab2End = #{slab_2_end}, slab3Discount = #{slab_3_discount}, slab3Start = #{slab_3_start}, slab3End = #{slab_3_end}, brandId = #{brandId}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, itemDetails = #{itemDetails} WHERE itemId = #{itemId}
